title: Distribution of GDP across economic sectors in the United Kingdom 2018
summary: The given chart is of multi-line type with 3 lines namely Agriculture, Industry, and Services. The y axis represents Distribution of GDP and the x axis represents Year.
Overall Agriculture, Industry, and Services are roughly constant,  throughout the Year
The lines ordered according to average values of Distribution of GDP in descending order is: 1. Services, 2. Industry, and lastly, 3. Agriculture.
Throughout the period, Services generally had the highest Distribution of GDP relative to others with an average of 70.47, and it reached its maximum at 2009 with a value of 71.61.
Followed by Industry which ranks as the second topmpost line , with an average of 18.4 Distribution of GDP,reaching its highest point  at 2008 with a value of 20.0.
The botommost line, Agriculture,  has a mean of 0.64, and peaked at 2009.
